commands.name: az connectedmachine assess-patches
commands.summary: Assess patches on an Azure Arc-Enabled Server.
commands.syntax:
az connectedmachine assess-patches [--ids]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--subscription]

commands.name: az connectedmachine install-patches
commands.summary: Install patches on an Azure Arc-Enabled Server.
commands.syntax:
az connectedmachine install-patches --maximum-duration
                                    --reboot-setting {Always, IfRequired, Never}
                                    [--ids]
                                    [--linux-parameters]
                                    [--name]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--windows-parameters]
examples: az connectedmachine install-patches --resource-group MyResourceGroup --name MyMachine --maximum-duration PT4H --reboot-setting IfRequired --windows-parameters "{"classificationsToInclude": ["Critical", "Security"]}"

commands.name: az connectedmachine list
commands.summary: List all Azure Arc-Enabled Servers in the specified resource group.

commands.name: az connectedmachine show
commands.summary: Get information about the model view or the instance view of an Azure Arc-Enabled Server.

commands.name: az connectedmachine update
commands.summary: Update an Azure Arc-Enabled Server. Please note some properties can be set only during machine creation.
commands.syntax:
az connectedmachine update [--add]
                           [--agent-upgrade]
                           [--client-public-key]
                           [--expand {instanceView}]
                           [--extensions]
                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--identity]
                           [--ids]
                           [--kind {AVS, AWS, EPS, GCP, HCI, SCVMM, VMware}]
                           [--license-profile]
                           [--location-data]
                           [--machine-name]
                           [--mssql-discovered]
                           [--os-profile]
                           [--os-type]
                           [--parent-cluster-id]
                           [--private-link-scope-id]
                           [--remove]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--service-statuses]
                           [--set]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--tags]
examples: az connectedmachine update --name myMachine --resource-group myResourceGroup --location eastus2euap

commands.name: az connectedmachine upgrade-extension
commands.syntax:
az connectedmachine upgrade-extension [--extension-targets]
                                      [--ids]
                                      [--machine-name]
                                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--subscription]
